t: Silvermine Stone | Show Village
s: Silvermine Stone was created by a mason who wanted to simplify the process of installing manufactured stone veneer. He knew that installing stone veneer piece by piece, using mortar, was a tedious and time-consuming process, and it required a skilled mason to do it right.
